sub_title: Project Engineer /Lead Project Coordinator/Electrical, Electronics and Communications Engineering
summary:
I am a self-motivated Electronics and Telecommunications Engineer who has a wide knowledge of project and team management and developing efficient business process models for different departments. I enjoy learning new skills, and dealing with different challenges and can fit in a multicultural work environment. I have consistently proven my ability to meet deadlines and achieve project objectives, solve mission-critical problems, and prioritize crucial tasks while maintaining the high standards expected of my role. 
I aim to obtain a position that meets my education and my job experience and develops my profession with additional field experience.

location.short: Alphen aan den Rijn, South Holland
location.default: Alphen aan den Rijn, South Holland, Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
-	Distributed packets and parcels between 5 different routes and drivers.
-	Prepared reports via Postnl software.
-	Found and arranged new manpower and vehicles( owned – leased).
profile_positions.title: Co-Owner

profile_positions.description:
- Supervised and monitored the progress of Abela Culinary Solutions' new division with 4 processing areas and 4 storage facilities.
- Coordinated with contractors, equipment and materials suppliers, and different departments involved with the project to ensure that each one has the tools it needs to meet project milestones.
- Created project schedules that include materials estimates, software requirements, and manpower needs to be submitted to management.
- Assisted in documenting project phases and created summary reports and meeting minutes for company management.
- Worked with field personnel to handle project issues as they arise.
- Prepared and encoded work instructions, boilerplate, and other data required for Batch Master Manufacturing and warehouse management system.
- Assisted in the preparation of process workflows, risk analysis, procedures, and guidelines. 
- Built a strong team by cultivating relationships between each crew and illustrating how individual team members affect the success of the entire project.
profile_positions.title: Lead Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
- Administer online purchasing systems, MS GP. 
- Ensure the continuous supply of required goods and materials and communicate any supply problems that may pose a risk or impact on business operations. 
- Monitor market trends, competitor strategies, and market suppliers. 
- Deliver briefs, updates, and reports as and when required. 
- Develop creative and innovative procurement processes.
- Negotiate contracts, improve prices and terms of business with suppliers, and review opportunities to make business savings utilizing negotiation and procurement best practice tools and methods.
- Assess and evaluate suppliers and undertake performance reviews to ensure contract compliance and manage performance improvement activities 
- Ensure compliance with company guidelines, purchasing policies, and procedures during supplier negotiations and the contract award process. 
- Explore alternate sources for goods and materials.  
- Assess tenders and quotations from potential suppliers. 
- Evaluate existing and new suppliers and contact suppliers to resolve price, quality, delivery, or invoice issues. 
- Work collaboratively and negotiate and engage with stakeholders and suppliers regarding new projects, supplies, and initiatives and advise of the impact of change on purchasing and production activities.
- Attend meetings and update others on issues or concerns, in particular when there is a risk that could prevent the organization from meeting customer demands or where there are over-capacity concerns
profile_positions.title: Business Process Specialist (Purchasing Department)

profile_positions.description:
- Designing and facilitating training courses including (presentations - activates - handouts – pamphlets and certificates) 
- Coordination of all training needs and requests from various locations (Qatar, Egypt and local departments).
- Coordinating with outsourced training companies for training courses, dates, Materials and payments means and date due.
- Interview and select qualified job applicants or refer them to managers, making hiring recommendations when appropriate.
- Hire employees and process hiring-related paperwork.
- Inform job applicants of details such as duties and responsibilities, compensation, benefits, schedules, working conditions, or promotion opportunities.
- Interpret and explain human resources policies, rules and regulations of the company.
- Address employee relations issues, such as harassment allegations, work complaints, or other employee concerns.
- Supervising the maintaining of employment records related to events such as hiring, termination, leaves, transfers, or promotions.
- Preparing HR strategies and policies and forms.
- Staff performance management and career development.
- Maintain and update human resources documents, such as organizational charts, employee handbooks or directories, or performance evaluation forms.
- Confer with management to develop or implement personnel policies or procedures.
- Preparing and organizing of Staff Party, Family day, National day, Christmas and New Year celebrations.
- Preparation of event programs such as group and individual games, live performances and videos. 
- Coordinating with outsource suppliers for events requirements (sound system, lighting system, projection system, outsource games, photographers, videographers and photo booth.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Specialist (HR & Training Department)

profile_positions.company: Syrian Company for the Storage and Distribution of Petroleum Products
profile_positions.description:
- Plan and initialize telecommunication networks between main office and oil fields.
- Define the technical requirements needed to implement UHF radio communication system/TETRA between oil and gas fields in Syria, telephony exchange PABX between SPC head office in Damascus and Rumeilan oil field.
- Study and evaluate tenders, auctions and bids of contractors.
- Prepare performance and cost reports.
- Define and study fire alarm and extinguishing systems, access control systems and security monitoring systems (IP- CCTV) for SPC head office and staff accommodations in oil fields.
- Wide knowledge in UHF/VHF telecommunication systems TETRA and GSM. 
- Familiar with telephony Exchanges PABX and VOIP.
profile_positions.title: Electronics and Telecommunications Project Engineer
